content:
internals.rust-lang.org currently has a message at the top saying "This site is in read only mode. Please continue to browse, but replying, likes, and other actions are disabled for now."

Is there some planned maintenance going on, or is there some kind of issue with the site?
Hm I don't think I'm seeing that - maybe has gone away now? I'm not aware of anything pre-planned though
It lasted less than an hour, starting a little while before I posted my message.
That happens fairly often to me. I mean, not every day but I notice it maybe every week or two. Maybe three.
I check back in half an hour and it's usually ok again.
I always figured there was an automatic upgrade or a new container being spun up or something like that.
